feedback_history.feedback: No visuals on any page — completely empty looking
Text pushed to one corner makes whole page look empty. Screen real estate should never be too crowded or too empty — always polished and balanced like a top-notch luxury fashion brand website
Design algorithm must ALWAYS change, never repeat. That is the whole benefit of the agentic system

Use DALL-E, Gemini, matplotlib, Pillow to generate real visuals — infographics, data visualizations, images. Use ALL tools in the toolkit to be creative, unique, different every time, but still classy and polished

Author must be 'Bhasker Kumar', not fictional names. Assisted by rotating luxury-brand-style name (like Jaguar Phantom — same flavor as high-end luxury goods: perfume, wallet, leather, jewelry brands). Mention it is an agentic system made of multiple agents using Claude, Gemini, and ChatGPT
Build proper orchestration of agents who TALK to each other, CRITICIZE each other, to produce a good design and messaging. Not a linear system. Consider LangGraph.

The design algo should behave like a top luxury product website designer. The messaging should read like it was written by a top advertisement script designer — make news as palatable as a luxury advertisement.
